document_data.name: Draconic sign language
document_data.mainbody: '''Draconic sign language''' was a form of [[sign language|non-verbal communication]] used by [[draconic]] creatures. It involved a series of movements of a dragon's maw, claws and wings.
document_data.Speakers: [[Scalamagdrion]]s were known for communicating with this form of sign language.
